alert.note: Alert for Wasatch Mountains I-80 North; Wasatch Mountains South of I-80 (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 13 at 2:30AM MST until December 13 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches, locally up to 8 inches in the Upper Cottonwoods and Ogden area mountains. * WHERE...Wasatch Mountains I-80 North and Wasatch Mountains South of I-80. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions can be expected tonight through Tuesday morning along all area roadways. Monitor for potential traction restrictions and/or closures on area routes.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511.

area.areaDesc: Wasatch Mountains I-80 North; Wasatch Mountains South of I-80
